class.name: GFQueryIterator
class.description:
The example below shows iteration of a query over entities with the Vector2 component: [codeblock] var query:GFQuery = GFGlobalWorld.query_builder() \ .with("glecs/meta/Vector2") \ .build()
for terms:Array[GFComponent] in query.iterate(): var vec2_c:= terms[0] print("X: %s, Y %s" % [vec2_c.getm("x"), vec2_c.getm("y")]) [/codeblock]

method.name: is_done
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this iterator has been exhausted.

method.name: is_started
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this iterator has started iterating.
